params.name: allowed
params.doc: Pass `true` to offer product by subscription and as one-time purchase. Pass `false` to offer product as subscription only.

docs.summary:
Allow for one-time purchase of a product.
By default, product can be sold only as part of a subscription, not as a one-time purchase.

Assign up to 6 subscription options to a specified product.
Pass an empty array to remove all subscription options assigned to a product.

Creates multiple subscription options (up to 100).
To assign to a product, call [`assignSubscriptionOptionsToProduct()`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-stores-v2/subscriptionoptions/assign-subscription-options-to-product).
Subscription options that are not assigned to a product will not be visible in the Wix business manager.

params.name: ids
params.doc: IDs of the subscription options to delete.

params.name: subscriptionOptions
params.doc: Subscription options info. Only the passed parameters in each subscription option will be updated.

docs.summary:
Updates multiple subscription options.
Only parameters passed will be updated.

Creates a subscription option.
To assign to a product, call [`assignSubscriptionOptionsToProduct()`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-stores-v2/subscriptionoptions/assign-subscription-options-to-product).
Subscription options that are not assigned to a product will not be visible in the Wix business manager.

params.name: _id
params.doc: ID of the subscription option to delete.

docs.summary: Checks whether a specified product (associated with subscription options) is available for one-time purchase.
Retrieves the IDs of products associated with a specified subscription option.
Retrieves a subscription option by ID.

Retrieves all subscription options assigned to a specified product.
By default, hidden subscription options are not returned. To retrieve all subscription options you must pass `includeHiddenSubscriptionOptions = true`.

params.name: _id
params.doc: Subscription option ID (auto-generated upon subscription option creation).

docs.summary:
Updates a subscription option.
Only parameters passed will be updated.

members.name: allowed
members.doc: Pass `true` to offer product by subscription and as one-time purchase. Pass `false` to offer product as subscription only.

members.name: productId
members.doc: Product ID.

members.name: assignedSubscriptionOptions
members.doc: Ordered array of subscription options that will be assigned to the product. Pass an empty array to remove all subscription options from the product.

members.name: assignedSubscriptionOptions
members.doc: Ordered array of subscription options that will be assigned to the product. Pass an empty array to remove all subscription options from the product.

members.doc: ids of subscription options which will be applied to original price

members.doc: ids of subscription options which will be applied to original price

members.name: prices
members.doc:
Original prices to which subscription options discount will be applied.
Key is identifier unique per price that can be used to match calculated prices with original price

members.name: _id
members.doc: Calculation id (product id)

members.name: prices
members.doc:
Original prices to which subscription options discount will be applied.
Key is identifier unique per price that can be used to match calculated prices with original price

members.name: subscriptionOptionIds
members.doc: ids of subscription options which will be applied to original price.

members.name: items
members.doc: Original prices to be calculated for each corresponding product id with related subscription plan ids

members.name: calculatedPrices
members.doc:
Key is identifier unique per price that can be used to match calculated prices with original price
Value is response with calculated prices for each subscription option

members.name: _id
members.doc: Calculation id (product id)

members.name: calculatedPrices
members.doc:
Key is identifier unique per price that can be used to match calculated prices with original price
Value is response with calculated prices for each subscription option

members.name: calculatedPricesPerProduct
members.doc:
Key is identifier unique per price that can be used to match calculated prices with original price
Value is response with calculated prices for each subscription option for each product

members.name: _id
members.doc: Subscription option ID (auto-generated upon subscription option creation).

members.name: description
members.doc: Subscription option description (optional).

members.name: discount
members.doc:
Discount info (optional).
For example, a $20 discount would be `value: 20`, `type: AMOUNT`.

members.name: subscriptionSettings
members.doc: Subscription charge times. For example, if `frequency: MONTH` and `billingCycles: 6`; payment will be made monthly for 6 months.
